verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%>, which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%>, <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: I have <S%H1431>nourished<s%> and brought <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, and they have rebelled against <S%H6586>me<s%>.

The <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> his <S%H7069>owner<s%>, and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> his <S%H1167>master<s%>'s <S%H18>crib<s%>; but <S%H3478>Israel<s%> doth not <S%H3045>know<s%>, my <S%H5971>people<s%> doth not <S%H995>consider<s%>.

Ah <S%H1945><s%> <S%H2398>sinful<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3515>laden<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, a <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>, <S%H1121>children<s%> that deal <S%H7843>corruptly<s%>! they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, they have <S%H5006>despised<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, they are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> and gone <S%H268>backward<s%>.

Why will ye be still <S%H5221>stricken<s%>, that ye <S%H5627>revolt<s%> more and <S%H3254>more<s%>? the whole <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H2483>sick<s%>, and the whole <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2483>faint<s%>.

From the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%> even unto the <S%H7218>head<s%> there is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in <S%H6482>it<s%>; but wounds, and <S%H2250>bruises<s%>, and <S%H2961>fresh<s%> <S%H4347>stripes<s%>: they have not been <S%H2115>closed<s%>, neither bound <S%H2280>up<s%>, neither <S%H7401>mollified<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Your <S%H776>country<s%> is <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; your <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; your <S%H127>land<s%>, <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> it in your <S%H8077>presence<s%>, and it is desolate, as <S%H4114>overthrown<s%> by <S%H2114>strangers<s%>.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> as a <S%H5521>booth<s%> in a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, as a <S%H4412>lodge<s%> in a garden of <S%H4750>cucumbers<s%>, as a <S%H5341>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Except <S%H3884><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> had <S%H3498>left<s%> unto us a very <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H8300>remnant<s%>, we should have <S%H1961>been<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, we should have been <S%H1819>like<s%> unto <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto the <S%H8451>law<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, ye <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>.

What <S%H4100><s%> unto me is the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: I have had <S%H7646>enough<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of fed <S%H4806>beasts<s%>; and I <S%H2654>delight<s%> not in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, or of <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, or of <S%H6260>he-goats<s%>.
When ye <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1245>me<s%>, who hath required this at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, to <S%H7429>trample<s%> my <S%H2691>courts<s%>?

Bring <S%H935><s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4503>oblations<s%>; <S%H7004>incense<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H2320>me<s%>; new moon and <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, the <S%H7121>calling<s%> of <S%H4744>assemblies<s%>,â€” I cannot away <S%H3201>with<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and the solemn <S%H6116>meeting<s%>.

Your new <S%H2320>moons<s%> and your appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%>; they are a <S%H2960>trouble<s%> unto <S%H3811>me<s%>; I am weary of bearing <S%H5375>them<s%>.

And when ye spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%>, I will <S%H5956>hide<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7235>you<s%>; yea, when ye make many <S%H8605>prayers<s%>, I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>: your <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H2135>you<s%>, make you clean; put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%> from <S%H5048>before<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; <S%H2308>cease<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>;

learn <S%H3925><s%> to do <S%H3190>well<s%>; <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>, <S%H833>relieve<s%> the <S%H2541>oppressed<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, <S%H7378>plead<s%> for the <S%H490>widow<s%>.

Come <S%H3212>now<s%>, and let us reason <S%H3198>together<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: though your <S%H2399>sins<s%> be as <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, they shall be as <S%H3835>white<s%> as <S%H7950>snow<s%>; though they be <S%H119>red<s%> like <S%H8438>crimson<s%>, they shall be as <S%H6785>wool<s%>.
If ye be <S%H14>willing<s%> and <S%H8085>obedient<s%>, ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>:
but if ye <S%H3985>refuse<s%> and <S%H4784>rebel<s%>, ye shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

How is the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> become a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>! she that was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>! <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in <S%H7523>her<s%>, but now murderers.
Thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> is become <S%H5509>dross<s%>, thy <S%H5435>wine<s%> <S%H4107>mixed<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

Thy <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>rebellious<s%>, and <S%H2270>companions<s%> of <S%H1590>thieves<s%>; every one <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H7810>bribes<s%>, and <S%H7291>followeth<s%> after <S%H8021>rewards<s%>: they <S%H8199>judge<s%> not the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, neither doth the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> come unto <S%H935>them<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the Mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1945>Ah<s%>, I will <S%H5162>ease<s%> me of mine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and <S%H5358>avenge<s%> me of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>;
and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H1253>thee<s%>, and thoroughly purge <S%H6884>away<s%> thy <S%H5509>dross<s%>, and will take <S%H5493>away<s%> all thy <S%H913>tin<s%>;

and I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> thy <S%H8199>judges<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and thy <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> as at the <S%H8462>beginning<s%>: <S%H310>afterward<s%> thou shalt be <S%H7121>called<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>town<s%>.
Zion <S%H6726><s%> shall be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> with <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and her <S%H7725>converts<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

But the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H3162>together<s%>, and they that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
For they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of the <S%H352>oaks<s%> which ye have <S%H2530>desired<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H2659>confounded<s%> for the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> that ye have <S%H977>chosen<s%>.
For ye shall be as an <S%H424>oak<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth<s%>, and as a <S%H1593>garden<s%> that hath no <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And the <S%H2634>strong<s%> shall be as <S%H5296>tow<s%>, and his <S%H6467>work<s%> as a <S%H5213>spark<s%>; and they shall <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and none shall quench <S%H3518>them<s%>.
